page.title: 07THE WORK OF THE POLICE
page.content: German Shepherd dogs are bred and used by the Police force after 13 weeks of training.The handler keeps his dog at home.There are 6 dogs in the force which were trained at Harperley Hall.4 were trained to search for drugs and 2 for explosives.They are taught a range of different attacks. The Police have 4 Rover 2600 patrol cars equipped with the latest technology.They are yellow and white and each carries a breathalizer and an emergency kit.The officers' main role is to patrol the major trunk routes and be first at an accident.2 or 3 years ago (now 1985) following a tragic road accident on the Pelton by-pass there was a safety campaign and now there is a safer crossing,better lighting and a speed restriction.
